import React, { useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button,Form} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../conponents/Rating' import Message from '../conponents/Message' import Loader from '../conponents/Loader' // import products from '../products' const ProductScreen=({istory,match})=> { const [qty, setQty]=useState(0); // const product=products.find((p)=>p._id===match.params.id) //comment kora line 2 ta product file theke data fetch korto.ekhon express theke korbe const dispatch=useDispatch() const productDetails=useSelector(state=> state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product}=productDetails useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch ,match]) const addToCartHandler=()=>{ history.push(`/cart/${ma}`) } return (
Go Back {loading ? : error ? {error} :(

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ? 'In Stock':'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty { setQty(e.target.value) }} > { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x)=>( )) } )} )}
) } export default ProductScreen;
